content.question: Shown above is a slope field for which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals the fraction with numerator y minus 2, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals the fraction with numerator y squared, minus 4, and denominator 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals the fraction with numerator x minus 2, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals the fraction with numerator x squared, minus 4, and denominator 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals the fraction with numerator y squared, minus 4, and denominator 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
